sentences.en: A minute later I spotted him in my rearview mirror.
sentences.cn: 一分钟以后，我从后视镜里发现了他。

sentences.en: I looked in the rearview mirror. Her eyes were glistening.
sentences.cn: 我从后视镜看了看，她的眼睛在闪着光。

sentences.en: The man could see someone flashing their lights at him through his rearview mirror.
sentences.cn: 那个人可以从后照镜看到有人在对他闪灯。
